name: @unified-repo-analyzer/frontend
description: React frontend for the Unified Repository Analyzer

scripts.dev: bun run vite || npm run vite
scripts.build: bun run vite build || npm run vite -- build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run vite build --mode production || cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run vite -- build --mode production
scripts.preview: bun run vite preview || npm run vite -- preview
scripts.test: bun run vitest run || npm run vitest -- run
scripts.test:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun run vitest run --coverage || cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run vitest -- run --coverage
scripts.test:watch: bun run vitest || npm run vitest

author: Unified Repository Analyzer Contributors
